ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: The creatures that I really needed to use Tashan on resist it, so I just stopped using it. ... When the people we love are stolen from us, the way to have them
ygData.messageBody:
The creatures that I really needed to use Tashan on resist it, so I just
stopped using it.

------
When the people we love are stolen from us, the way to have them live on is
to never stop loving them. Buildings burn, people die, but real love is
forever. -- The Crow

-----Original Message-----
From: Anubis <anubis@...>
To: 'EQ_spell_research@onelist.com' <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 10:33 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] (no subject)
>I don't know about you, but when spells would be resisted a lot, tashan
>made a world of difference. I just recently hit L9, and I'm already 1.5
>bubbles away from 10. Off to play now, in fact!
